long_description: The haze in this circular room is starting to clear as you hear a hissing sound.  Atop a few tables along the north wall are a clutter of bottles of liquid and connected glass piping.  You can now visibly see a locked glass display case that contains a key.  There appears to be a puzzle or maze of some sort admidst the clutter, perhaps this will help open the display case.
short_description: Poisonous gas has been cleared by use of the blue-flamed arrow.  There is a display case that holds a key.

Puzzle.name: Puzzle
Puzzle.description: This puzzle must be solved in order to gain access to display case.

Display_Case.name: Display_Case
Display_Case.description: This display case contains an item.
